item.create_mobile_packages.portable_sto: When sneak clicked on a Stock Link or Stock Ticker
Portable Stock Ticker will bind to the Network
Portable Stock Ticker will open a mobile Stock Keeper menu
item.create_mobile_packages.mobile_packa: Opens a menu to create Packages
Opens a menu to modify Packages
create_mobile_packages.robo_entity.death: Robo Bee died at X %1$s Y %2$s Z %3$s with a Package for %4$s
create_mobile_packages.ponder.robo_bee_p: The Robo Bee Port can send a Package to a Player.
Place a package with an address matching the Player's name in the Robo Bee Port.
Place a Robo Bee in the Robo Bee Slot in the Robo Bee Port.
The Port will now send the Robo Bee to the Player who's name matches the address in the package.
create_mobile_packages.ponder.pull_from_: Put a package into the chest.
The Port will pull the package from any adjacent inventory and take it in.
create_mobile_packages.ponder.simple_set: This is a basic setup for automated package handling.
Place a Chest or any other storage.
Place a Packager facing the storage to create packages.
Connect a Stocklink to the Packager to connect it to a logistics network.
Finally, place a Robo Bee Port to send packages.
create_mobile_packages.ponder.push_to_ch: The Robo Bee Port can push it to adjacent inventories when powered by redstone.
Make sure the Port is powered by redstone.
The package will be pushed into any adjacent inventory, such as a chest.
create_mobile_packages.ponder.crafter_se: This is a setup for automated crafting and with the Robo Bee Port.
The Re-Packager splits the package into multiple smaller packages.
Packages are sent through a Chute to the Packager.
The Packager is connected to a 3x3 Mechanical Crafter, which crafts the items.
The crafted output is placed into a Chest.
create_mobile_packages.ponder.port_to_po: The Robo Bee Port can also send packages to another Port.
Set an address in the destination Port.
Set the same address as the package address and place the package in the first Port.
The package will be sent from one Port to the other.
This feature can be disabled in the configuration files.
When holding a package in the offhand it will be send with the Robo Bee.
Item to spawn a Robo Bee. Needed in Robo Bee Ports to send packages.
